  Phosphorus delivery is a major water quality concern in the Lake Champlain basin. We quantified sediment and associated P deposition on floodplains to understand drivers of nutrient attenuation.

***Read more about it in [Earth Surface Processes and Landforms](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/esp.5519)***
